2068930.name: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms - Supporter Pack
2068930.description:
Have you fallen in love with our game, or just really want to support the development of Alaloth - Champions of The Four Kingdoms and wear a badge to prove it?
The Supporter Pack is for you!

This treasure trove is filled to the brim with riches and trinkets in the form of unique gifts and cosmetic add-ons such as:

  • Higborn Armor Set: a unique armor set to slay in style, wearing our colors
  • Nikan: an amazing pet for your stronghold
  • Wisdom of the Mudar: a unique piece of furniture for your stronghold. A magic globe from the old world
  • Resources: 500G, an offensive and a defensive Arcane Gem, an Orb of Chaos and some potions for your first steps in Plamen
  • HD Wallpapers: 10 UHD wallpapers from our art team [1920x1080, 2560x1080, 2560x1440, 3840x2160, 3440x1440, 1600x900, 1536x864, 1440x900, 1366x768, 1280x720]
  • Discord special role

Important note: by buying this DLC, you are first and foremost showing your support for the development of Alaloth - Champions of The Four Kingdoms and for us, the developers.
2068930.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
